attributes.description:
With VW Polokwane Master Cars we give our customers total peace of mind; every car is checked in our workshop by a qualified VW Technician and undergo a 80 point quality check . Everything that needs to be done is done to the vehicle before you take delivery. 

We are committed to making your purchase experience as easy as possible and are happy to take any trade-in, however old, organize finance for you and any of our other products that will help your ownership experience to be effortless.

Nation wide delivery

attributes.title: 2022 Volkswagen Polo 1.0 TSI Life

attributes.description: Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock. A 1% of the value of the vehicle non refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another nonrefundable deposit to secure it further.. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!
attributes.options: Aircon, Electric Windows, Air bags, Radio
attributes.title: 2011 Audi R8 AUDI R8 5.2 FSI QUATTRO SPYDER

attributes.description: A/C, ABS, Airbags, Bluetooth, Central Locking, Climate Control, Electric Mirrors, Electric Windows, Full Service History, Keyless Entry, LED Headlights, Mags, Multi-Functional Steering Wheel, Navigation, P/S, Parking Sensors, PDC, Radio/CD, Reverse Camera, USB, Xenon Lights, Balance of 5 Years or 150 000km Mechanical Warranty & 3 Years 45 000km Service Plan. BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our Valued customers. For Excellent Service Contact our Sales Manager - Ernest Smith As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully fledged automotive dealer group offers New cars, Used Cars, Parts and service to all existing and potential customers. With us you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience but potentially a life-long partnership. To find out more about this vehicle, contact the dealer now
